sqlMap.select: SELECT F.FCLTS_NO , F.FCLTS_NM , F.ROUTE , F.FCLTS_GBN , F.FCLTS_SE , F.FCLTS_KND , F.LOC_DO , F.LOC_SI , F.LOC_DONG , F.LOC_JIBUN , F.MNG_MAINBD_SE , F.MNG_MAINBD , F.OWNER , F.BLD_DT , F.FLAW_END_DT , DECODE(F.DTLS_SPEC_YN,'Y','유','N','무') DTLS_SPEC_YN , DECODE(F.QC_HIST_YN,'Y','유','N','무') QC_HIST_YN , DECODE(F.MNTN_HIST_YN,'Y','유','N','무') MNTN_HIST_YN , F.PLAN_BEGIN_DT , F.PLAN_END_DT , F.PLANNER , F.CNST_BEGIN_DT , F.CNST_END_DT , F.CNSTRTR , (F.CNSTRCT_AMT/1000000) CNSTRCT_AMT , DECODE(F.ERQ_PROOF_PLAN_APPLC_ENNC,'Y','예','N','아니오') ERQ_PROOF_PLAN_APPLC_ENNC , F.INSPECT_BEGIN_DT , F.INSPECT_END_DT , F.INSPECTOR , F.CNST_ORDER_BODY , F.CNST_NM , F.CNST_SUPERVISOR , F.PLAN_BOOK_MNTEN , F.WRT_DT , F.WRT_USR , F.LAST_UPDT_DT , F.LAST_UPDT_USR , F.BASIC_RM , F.MAX_SHIP_SCL , F.EXTD , F.UPSIDE_ALT , F.DPWT , F.FMT_1_DESC_1 , F.FMT_1_DESC_2 , F.FMT_1_DESC_3 , F.FMT_1_DESC_4 , F.FMT_2_DESC_1_1 , F.FMT_2_DESC_1_2 , F.FMT_2_DESC_1_3 , F.FMT_2_DESC_2 , F.FMT_2_DESC_3 , F.FMT_3_DESC_1 , F.FMT_3_DESC_2 , F.ETC_DTLS_SPEC , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , F.REG_USR , F.REGIST_DT , F.UPD_USR , F.UPDT_DT FROM FCLTS_MNG_REGIST_F F WHERE F.FCLTS_NO = #fcltsNo#
